WorkflowInfo.Name: Clear Windows Update Cache
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
